resources.string:
BuyDesire is the best served with the in-store shopping experience. People are using BuyDesire to find and buy in-store products they love. 
 
Follow all of your favourite stores and people in one place to get a personallised feed of what's trending, along with recommendations jst for you! 
 
We bring your and endless stream of the in-store sensory experience, both popular and to hard items all from peple just like you. 
 
Use BuyDesire to tag items you love while browsing in-store, create multiple lists to share with friends, family or that special person - your choose what's meant to be kept secret. 
 
Warning Label: Use with care. 
 
BuyDesire is highly addictive and can be dangerous for those on a budget.
This is a shorlist of our most frequently questions. For more information about BuyDesire or if you need support, please contact us.

BuyDesire is a mobile app that connects you to the brands you know and love so you can enjoy exclusively tailored offer and promotions directly to items you have scanned in-store, it will be added to your MyDesires List. 
 
Once an item has been added to My Desires, you will be able to view all of the latest product and pricing information that may include customer reviews and videos, you'll be able to share your desires with friends and family for their feedback. 
 
To place an order simply add the items from your "MyDesires" list to "Shopping Bag" and click "Proceed to Checkout". When an order is confirmed, you will receive an order confirmation email and In App in the "Purchases" tab so you can keep track of all of your purchases through BuyDesire.

When your order is confirmed, the retailer you purchased the items from will be notified inmediately. Depending on what delivery method you selected during Checkout, your items will either be made abailable for collection in-store or will be packaged and shipped to your address by the retailer. \n \nTo check order delivery times for each of our participating retailers, please visit the BuyDesire website www.buydesire.com.

The retailer you purchased the items from is responible for fulliling and shipping your order. Deliveries will be packaged and shipped within the time you selected during Checkout. \n \nTo check the status of your order, please contact the Customer Service Centre of the retailer you placed the order through. Contact details for all participating retailers anc be found by visiting the BuyDesire website www.buydesire.com.

Our participating retailers want to ensure you are completely satisfied with your orders and understand sometimes an item may not be suitable. BuyDesire Members may exchange or return full-priced merchandise in its original condition, with appropriate barcodes and proof of purchase to the retailer you placed the order through. \n \nFor more details on how to return or exchange items through particitpating retailers, please visit the BuyDesire website www.buydesire.com.

BuyDesire takes the security of your sensitive customer information seriously. We have taken appropriate security measures including procedural, technical and administrative to help safeguard your personal information. All customer information is located on a secure server behind a firewall and is not directly connected to the internet. The intergrity of this firewall is tested regularly and it meets all recognised industry standards. 
 
BuyDesire use 128-bit Secure Sockets Layer(SSL) encryption technology in the transmission of your sensitive personal information between your system and ours that provides security while information is being trasmitted over the Internet or through a mobile device. 
 
To check the security of your coneection during checkout, look for the unbroken key or closed look at the bottom of your brower window. this indicates SSL is active. We want you to feel confident purchasing items through BuyDesire. However, you should be aware that 100% security is not always possible and although we take steps to secure your information, we do not promise, and you should not expect, that your personal informatin or orther communications will wlways remain secure. Should any event occur when your sensitive personal information is compromised, we will notify you immediately. 
 
Placement of any orders or submisson of enquiries at BuyDesire is taken as acceptance of the above Security guidelines. 
 
If you have nay concerns regarding our Security policy, lease contact our Customer SUpport Centre welhello@buydesire.com.
